On this page: [Testing](#test) [Infection prevention and control](#ipc) [Visitors and outside services](#visit) [Vaccination](#vax) COVID-19 Reporting in Minnesota Long-Term Care Settings [Reporting Requirements for Minnesota Long-term Care Facilities (PDF)](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/ltcreportrecs.pdf) One page summary of reporting requirements. - Different reporting types: [COVID-19 Long-Term Care Report Form](https://redcap-c19.web.health.state.mn.us/redcap/surveys/?s=HH47NMERJHJX7CJF) Form to report case counts, deaths, and outbreaks to MDH [CDC: LTCF COVID-19 Module](https://www.cdc.gov/nhsn/ltc/covid19/index.html) Information on case and lab reporting through NHSN [Uploading Lab Results to SimpleReport](https://www.simplereport.gov/using-simplereport/) Information on lab reporting through MDH SimpleReport - Testing [Long-term Care Testing: COVID-19](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/ltctesting.html) All guidance and materials related to LTC testing activities. Infection prevention and control [Infection Prevention and Control: COVID-19](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/infectioncontrol.html) Guidance and resources for infection prevention and control in health care settings. [Employee Illness Tracking Tool (Excel)](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/illtracktool.xlsx)| [Instructions (PDF)](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/illtracktool.pdf) 5/26/20 [Resident Cohorts Respiratory Outbreaks in Long-term Care (PDF)](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/ltcipchohort.pdf) Updated 7/26/23 [Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) and Fan Considerations for Long-term Care during COVID-19 (PDF)](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/hvac.pdf) 5/19/21 [Elections and Voting Guidance for Long-term Care Facilities (PDF)](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/ltcvoting.pdf) 8/18/22 [CDC: Interim Infection Prevention and Control Recommendations to Prevent SARS-CoV-2 Spread in Nursing Homes](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/hcp/long-term-care.html) [CDC: Interim guidance for Managing Healthcare Personnel with SARS-CoV-2 Infection or Exposure to SARS-CoV-2](https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/hcp/guidance-risk-assesment-hcp.html) Visitors and outside services Long term care facilities in Minnesota should refer to CMS and CDC for updated visitation guidelines and recommendations: [COVID-19 Guidance: Long-term Care Indoor Visitation for Nursing Facilities and Assisted Living Settings (PDF)](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/ltcindoor.pdf) Updated 6/17/22 Staffing [Health Care Worker Isolation and Exposure Recommendations](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/exposure.html) Includes foundational CDC guidance links and supplemental MDH recommendations to establish isolation and exposure management protocols. [Defining Crisis Staffing Shortage in Congregate Care Facilities: COVID-19](/diseases/coronavirus/hcp/crisis.html) Review the criteria and definitions provided. A link to Clarification of Staffing Options provides more information. Vaccination [MIIC User Guidance and Training Resources](/people/immunize/miic/train/index.html#users1) Learn to use population-based tools and reports in MIIC, such as client follow-up, to determine COVID-19 vaccination status of your long-term care residents.
